00002 #include <dds/config.hpp>
00003 #include <dds/waitset.hpp>

00005 DEFINE_EXCEPTION(dds, InterruptedException)
00006 
00007 dds::WaitSet::WaitSet() { }
00008 
00009 dds::WaitSet::WaitSet(const Condition& cond) {
00010         this->attach(cond);
00011 }
00012 
00013 dds::WaitSet::~WaitSet() {
00014         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < cond_vec_.size(); ++i) {
00015                 waitset_.detach_condition(cond_vec_[i]->get_dds_condition());
00016         }
00017 }
00018 
00019 dds::ReturnCode_t
00020 dds::WaitSet::attach(const dds::Condition& cond) {
00021         cond_vec_.push_back(cond);
00022         return waitset_.attach_condition(cond->get_dds_condition());
00023 }
00024 
00025 dds::ReturnCode_t
00026 dds::WaitSet::detach(const dds::Condition& cond) {
00027   cond_vec_.erase(std::remove(cond_vec_.begin(), cond_vec_.end(), cond), 
00028                   cond_vec_.end());
00029   return waitset_.detach_condition(cond->get_dds_condition());
00030 }
00031 
00032 
00033 dds::WaitSet&
00034 dds::WaitSet::operator+=(const ::dds::Condition& cond) {
00035         this->attach(cond);
00036         return *this;
00037 }
00038 
00039 
00040 dds::WaitSet&
00041 dds::WaitSet::operator-=(const dds::Condition& cond) {
00042         this->detach(cond);
00043         return *this;
00044 }
00045 
00046 dds::WaitSet::iterator
00047 dds::WaitSet::begin() {
00048         return cond_vec_.begin();
00049 }
00050 
00051 dds::WaitSet::iterator
00052 dds::WaitSet::end() {
00053         return cond_vec_.end();
00054 }
00055 
00056 ::dds::ConditionVector 
00057 dds::WaitSet::triggered_conditions() {
00058   ConditionVector ecvec;
00059   
00060   for (unsigned int i = 0; i < cond_vec_.size(); ++i) {
00061     if (cond_vec_[i]->get_trigger_value())
00062       ecvec.push_back(cond_vec_[i]);
00063   }
00064   return ecvec;
00065 }
00066 
00067 void 
00068 dds::WaitSet::wait (DDS::ConditionSeq& seq) {
00069   int rc = waitset_.wait(seq, DDS::DURATION_INFINITE);
00070   if (rc == DDS::RETCODE_ALREADY_DELETED)
00071     throw dds::InterruptedException("Wait Interrupted by External Signal",
00072                                     __FILE__, rc);
00073 }
00074 
00075 void
00076 dds::WaitSet::wait(const dds::Duration_t& timeout) {
00077   DDS::ConditionSeq cseq;
00078   int rc = waitset_.wait(cseq, timeout);
00079   if (rc == DDS::RETCODE_ALREADY_DELETED)
00080     throw dds::InterruptedException("Wait Interrupted by External Signal",
00081                                     __FILE__, rc);
00082 }
00083 
00084 void
00085 dds::WaitSet::dispatch(const dds::Duration_t& timeout) {
00086         DDS::ConditionSeq cseq;
00087         int rc = waitset_.wait(cseq, timeout);
00088         if (rc == DDS::RETCODE_ALREADY_DELETED)
00089           throw dds::InterruptedException("Wait Interrupted by External Signal",
00090                                           __FILE__, rc);
00091         
00092         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < cond_vec_.size(); ++i)
00093           if (cond_vec_[i]->get_trigger_value())
00094             cond_vec_[i]->execute();
00095 }
00096 
00097 void
00098 dds::WaitSet::dispatch() {
00099         this->dispatch(DDS::DURATION_INFINITE);
00100 }
00101 
00102 
00103 void
00104 dds::WaitSet::wait() {
00105   this->wait(DDS::DURATION_INFINITE);
00106 }
